Interface for standard SPI EEPROM memories (spieeprom.c)
[Drivers (for external hardware)] 

 #include "spieeprom.h"
Overview
This library provides functions for reading and writing standard 25Cxxx/25LCxxx SPI EEPROM memories. Memory sizes up to 64Kbytes are supported. Future revisions may include page-write support.
Library not fully tested!
